price: 61. Alobi: Eh bato ba ngai! Nazali na libunga te, kasi nazali motindami kowuta epai ya Nkolo wa molongo.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي ضَلَٰلَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī ḍalālatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
